headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ROBERTS, NORMA RAYMOND

snippet: ROBERTS--Norma Raymond, of Scarsdale, NY, died on January 31, 2016. She was 96. Norma grew up in Mt. Vernon, NY, and attended Barnard College. In 1944 she married Alvin V. Roberts. Their four children and four grandchildren survive them. In 1975, Norma began a career as a real estate agent. She retired at age 88. She was active in Scarsdale civic affairs and maintained a lifelong love of music and her family. She is very much missed. The funeral will be held on Wednesday, February 3, at 1pm at Ballard Durand Funeral Services, 2 Maple Avenue, White Plains, NY. 1/3
